reqs:
Pre-reqs: BIOL 335 and one of BIOC 300, BIOC 302, BIOC 303, BIOL 350.
OPTIONAL textbook: "The Biology of Cancer" by Robert A. Weinberg (2nd Edition)
Note: A background in cell biology is assumed - a grade of B or higher in BIOL 335 is strongly recommended. The course requires extensive independent reading of scientific journal articles.
courseName: Genetics and Cell Biology of Cancer
description: Molecular mechanisms of oncogenes and tumor suppressors and the effects of oncogenic mutations on the biology of cancer cells.
